text: Gennady Andreyevich Zyuganov (born 1944 in Mymrino) is a Russian politician. He has led the Communist Party of the Russian Federation (CPRF) since 1993. He has campaigned for the Russian presidency four times. He has finished second each time. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet colonels Category:Russian communist politicians Category:Oryol Oblast
title: Gennady Zyuganov
